evidence.claim: A1 Healthcare uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure, providing scalable and secure hosting services.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure handling of patient data.
A1 Healthcare employs HL7 standards for interoperability in its health information exchange.
They utilize FHIR resources for modern healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of significant EDI or X12 transaction activities found.
